text:
Hi Everyone I want to learn about HubSpot CRM however really don't know how to start or where to I need to start, can anyone suggest me it would really help me. it helps me.
Thanks in advance! :blush:

Hi! HubSpot CRM is a complex tool. I suggest picking one aspect and starting to learn more about it.

For any HubSpot-related knowledge, <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/7813309/results?search=CRM&contentType=COURSE|HubSpot Academy> is a great place to start
